sentences.en: Detectives have run into a conspiracy of silence in the tight-knit communities of the peninsula.
sentences.cn: 侦探们犯了难，半岛上各个群体抱成一团，达成了保持缄默的密约。

sentences.en: During the war, Joan helped her mother knit scarves for soldiers.
sentences.cn: 战争期间，琼帮妈妈给战士们织围巾。

sentences.en: Ferris wore a heavy knit sweater.
sentences.cn: 费里斯身着一件织得厚厚的毛衣。

sentences.en: I had endless hours to knit and sew.
sentences.cn: 我整天无休止地编织缝纫。

sentences.en: I have already started knitting baby clothes.
sentences.cn: 我已经开始织婴儿的衣服了。

sentences.en: Joan was delighted to welcome her boyfriend into the bosom of her large, close-knit family.
sentences.cn: 琼十分高兴地欢迎她的男朋友加入她亲密无间的大家庭。

sentences.en: Knit the next two stitches together to make the garment narrower.
sentences.cn: 下两针织在一起,把衣服弄瘦点儿.

sentences.en: My grandmother taught me how to knit.
Send for our free patterns to knit yourself.
sentences.cn: 欢迎函索免费式样体验自己编织的乐趣。

sentences.en: Surgeons placed a metal band around the knee cap to help it knit back together.
sentences.cn: 外科医生在膝盖骨上套了个金属箍以帮助其愈合。

sentences.en: the close-knit community of a small village
sentences.cn: 小村庄里亲密结合在一起的村民

sentences.en: The doctor knit the two broken bones in his arm.
sentences.cn: 医生把他臂上的两块折骨接好了.

trans.tran_cn: 编结，编织；使紧密地结合，使紧凑；皱紧，皱
